NAME: allweather - TRANSWEATHER
DESCRIPTION: 9000 images sampled from Snow100K, 1069 from Raindrop, and 9000 Outdoor-Rain images aggregated for all-weather restoration.

NAME: Foggy_Cityscapes
DESCRIPTION: Cityscapes-derived synthetic fog dataset: 500 dense fog, 500 medium fog, 500 clear reference images.

NAME: Fuji2025 (SID)
DESCRIPTION: Fuji subset of the SID (See-in-the-Dark) dataset with 2397 short-exposure low-light images and 193 corresponding long-exposure reference images.

NAME: HQ-NightRain-Dataset
DESCRIPTION: High-quality night rain dataset with 10000 training, 300 test, and 900 validation rain images under low-light conditions.

NAME: Indoor Training Set (ITS) [RESIDE-Standard]
DESCRIPTION: Part of RESIDE-Standard: 1399 clear, 1399 hazy, 1399 transmission maps for indoor synthetic haze.

NAME: LOL-v1 (LLE part 1)
DESCRIPTION: LOw-Light (LOL) paired dataset: 485 low/normal-light training pairs and 15 testing pairs for supervised low-light enhancement.

NAME: LOL Raw synthetic pairs (LLE part 2)
DESCRIPTION: Synthetic image pairs from RAW images: 1000 low-light and 1000 corresponding high-quality images.

NAME: LOL test sets (LLE part 3)
DESCRIPTION: Seven test sets with a total of about 200 images for benchmarking low-light enhancement.

NAME: LWDDS
DESCRIPTION: Large-scale synthetic raindrop dataset with 67500 image pairs for raindrop removal.

NAME: NH-HAZE
DESCRIPTION: NTIRE 2020 NH-HAZE challenge dataset with 55 clear and 55 heterogeneous real-world hazy images.

NAME: NKUSR8K
DESCRIPTION: NKUSR8K dataset for natural image super-resolution research with 1003 high-resolution images.

NAME: O-HAZY
DESCRIPTION: Outdoor haze dataset with 45 clear and 45 corresponding real hazy images.

NAME: Rain Cityscapes
DESCRIPTION: Rainy version of Cityscapes: 9432 training and 1188 test images with depth maps, for deraining and segmentation.

NAME: Rain100L
DESCRIPTION: Deraining dataset with 100 rainy and 100 ground-truth clear images.

NAME: Rain1400
DESCRIPTION: Training: 12600 rainy/clean pairs; testing: 1400 rainy/clean pairs across multiple rain streak patterns.

NAME: RESIDE-Beta (OTS+RTTS)
DESCRIPTION: REalistic Single Image DEhazing, outdoor track: OTS (72135 synthetic) and RTTS (4322 real hazy traffic images).

NAME: RESIDE-Standard
DESCRIPTION: Standard RESIDE track: ITS (13990 synthetic indoor), SOTS (500 synthetic test), HSTS (20 hard test images).

NAME: RRSHID
DESCRIPTION: Real-world haze dataset of 3053 paired hazy and corresponding haze-free images for single-image dehazing.

NAME: SmokeBench
DESCRIPTION: Real-world early-stage fire surveillance smoke benchmark with 9875 training pairs and 100 test pairs.

NAME: Snow100K
DESCRIPTION: Synthetic snow dataset Snow100K-S/M/L (~33k each) with paired clean/snowy images.

NAME: SnowCityScapes
DESCRIPTION: Dataset derived from Cityscapes with 2975 clean and about 8925 snowy images across three density levels.

NAME: SnowKITTI2012
DESCRIPTION: Snowy KITTI 2012 with 7481 clean images Ã— 3 snow levels, totaling 22443 snow/clean pairs.

NAME: Sony2025 (SID)
DESCRIPTION: Sony subset of SID with 2697 short-exposure low-light images and 231 long-exposure reference images.

NAME: SynthRSF
DESCRIPTION: Synthetic Remote Sensing Fog dataset with 500 scenes and 13800 noisy images plus GT/depth/semantic annotations.

NAME: WeatherBench (multi-weather restoration)
DESCRIPTION: WeatherBench image restoration dataset with 41402 training and 600 test pairs at 512x512 resolution for haze, rain, and snow.

NAME: HazeSpace2M
DESCRIPTION: Massive haze-aware dataset with over 130k clean images and about 2M hazy images across multiple haze types and intensities (fog, environmental haze, cloud).

NAME: Haze1K
DESCRIPTION: Remote-sensing-oriented dehazing dataset with 900 hazy/clean pairs grouped by haze density.

NAME: RS-Haze
DESCRIPTION: Remote sensing haze dataset with multiple haze levels and diverse land-cover scenes for satellite image dehazing.

NAME: Foggy Zurich
DESCRIPTION: Real-world foggy street scenes with pixel-level annotations for semantic segmentation; includes unannotated foggy images.

NAME: MCASD (Multi-Condition Atmospheric Scene Dataset)
DESCRIPTION: Multi-condition atmospheric scene dataset including light/medium/plowed snow and other adverse visibility conditions for dehazing and low-light studies.

NAME: ExDark
DESCRIPTION: Exclusively Dark dataset with 7363 low-light images across 10 lighting conditions and 12 object classes for detection and enhancement.

NAME: LLVIP
DESCRIPTION: Low-Light Visible and Infrared Paired dataset with 15488 visible/infrared pairs for enhancement and fusion, focused on pedestrian detection.

NAME: LoLI-Street
DESCRIPTION: LoLI-Street dataset with 30k train, 3k val, and 1k real low-light test images of street scenes across three illumination levels.

NAME: SICE
DESCRIPTION: SICE dataset with 589 scenes under varied illumination conditions, providing multi-exposure images useful for exposure correction and enhancement.

NAME: LIME
DESCRIPTION: LIME dataset containing 10000 natural low-light images used for low-light enhancement evaluation.

NAME: DPED
DESCRIPTION: DPED dataset with smartphone and DSLR image pairs, often used for low-light and quality enhancement of mobile photos.

NAME: SID (full See-in-the-Dark)
DESCRIPTION: Full SID dataset with 5094 short-exposure RAW images and corresponding long-exposure references (includes Sony and Fuji subsets).

NAME: LoL v2 (LOLv2)
DESCRIPTION: Extended LOL dataset version 2 with more scenes and illumination variations for supervised low-light enhancement.

NAME: LSD3K
DESCRIPTION: Laparoscopic Surgery Desmoking Dataset with 3000 paired synthetic smoky/clean images plus 50 real smoky images.

NAME: SRRS (Snow Removal from Real Scenes)
DESCRIPTION: Synthetic and real snow dataset SRRS with about 16000 images used for desnowing research.

NAME: CSD (Comprehensive Snow Dataset)
DESCRIPTION: Comprehensive Snow Dataset with 10000 synthetic snowy images generated from RESIDE clean images via snowflake/snow streak synthesis.

NAME: SITD (Snow Image Training Dataset)
DESCRIPTION: Snow training dataset with 3000 outdoor synthetic snowy images for desnowing benchmarks.

NAME: LoL-SRW (Low-light SR/Weather)
DESCRIPTION: LSRW dataset with 50 paired images (Huawei + Nikon) for low-light super-resolution and restoration.

NAME: NTIRE Desnowing Challenge Dataset
DESCRIPTION: NTIRE desnowing challenge dataset built from Snow100K and related snow data for benchmarking desnowing models.

NAME: NTIRE Nighttime Dehazing Dataset
DESCRIPTION: NTIRE nighttime dehazing dataset with real nighttime hazy images and corresponding references for joint low-light and haze removal.

NAME: UIEB
DESCRIPTION: Underwater Image Enhancement Benchmark (UIEB) with 890 real paired images and 60 challenging samples.

NAME: EUVP
DESCRIPTION: Large-scale dataset for enhancing underwater visual perception with paired and unpaired sets.

NAME: MOUD
DESCRIPTION: Multimodal Optical Underwater Dataset (2025) for enhancement, detection, and 3D reconstruction.

NAME: Sand11K
DESCRIPTION: Single image sand-dust removal dataset with varying levels of degradation (2025 release).

NAME: SIRB
DESCRIPTION: Sand-dust Image Reconstruction Benchmark (SIRB) with synthetic and real-world images.

NAME: Raindrop Clarity
DESCRIPTION: NTIRE 2025 challenge dataset for day/night raindrop removal on camera lenses.

NAME: URIR-8K
DESCRIPTION: Universal Rainy Image Restoration (URIR) benchmark covering streaks, drops, and night rain.

NAME: HDRT
DESCRIPTION: Large-scale dataset for Infrared-Guided HDR Imaging with aligned IR and RGB frames.

NAME: FLIR ADAS v2
DESCRIPTION: Annotated Thermal and Visible spectrum frames for object detection in adverse weather.

NAME: LSUI
DESCRIPTION: Large-Scale Underwater Image (LSUI) dataset covering diverse water types and lighting.
